title: Art in Nudity and Nudity in Art
description: Essentially, art is a form of nudity: it bares the souls of innocents and perverts alike. Explore the theme in this wonderful collection of classical art!

images.desc: Athenian Red-figure Kylix - attributed to Dokimasia Painter (ca 480 BC)
Pan copulating with a Goat - Unknown Artist (1st century AD)
Venus and Cupid - Lucas Cranach the Elder (ca 1525)
Susanna and the Elders - Artemisia Gentileschi (1610)
Study of a Nude Man - follower of Pierre Guérin (ca 1810)
Dream of the Fisherman's Wife - Katsushika Hokusai (1814)
Study of a Nude Man - Gustave Courbet (1839)
